TopicTitle: Series of 5 short movies in KSP

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I just wanted to share my videos with you all. There is going to be 5 short movies made in KSP in memory of NASA\'s historical events using NASA radio transmissions.

**Here is the first episode:**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_s00W_euCFU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

This is the first episode to the Kerbals in Space series of 5 short movies that have been made in KSP. In this episode the guys down at KSC have developed a small shuttle that they plan to use as a prototype for their Mun rover. But they haven\'t got enough control to use the same design on Mun, so its back to the drawing board.

**EPISODE 2**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/g69O0GL1hy0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

In this episode the guys down at KSC have developed a small lander complete with a slowing thrust pod, and they want to make sure that it will handle the extremes of space and have enough fuel to land.

Hope you guys enjoy.

Voice over - NASA Radio transmissions 

(This episode is in the memory of the Discovery space shuttle)
Very cool! I really love how you made the voices high pitched to fit kerbals ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
